name: Washed Up (Fib)
description:
Control a sailboat to dodge ocean waves and wildlife as you escape a deserted island. Get as high of a score as possible by riding waves, dodging coconuts & rabid fish. Put your high score in the comments section!

If the resolution is too small for you, try full screen mode by clicking the button in the bottom right hand corner of the game screen, or by pressing F1.

Controls:

  • Left & right arrow keys - Sail your boat left and right
  • Up arrow key - Jump your sailboat like a pro

Created in 20 hours for a local game jam in Omaha, Nebraska.(https://www.facebook.com/event...)

Created by:

  • Christopher Fibich  (@Fib_Pixelmonium) - Programmer
  • Luke Pena - Art / animation & audio
